name: Asian Art Institute
description: Asia's biggest art collection offers a focus on modern art, but lovers of more classical pieces will also find some treasures of art history.

name: Art Heritage Center
description: Celebrate the classical craft of painting with thousands or artworks from the Renaissance up until the 20th Century.

name: Modern Art Museum
description: Explore the dynamic world of modern art at this contemporary museum. Featuring works by Picasso, Warhol, and Hockney, this museum showcases the diversity and innovation of 20th-century art.

name: Impressionist Collection
description: Step into a world of light and color with this stunning collection of Impressionist art. Featuring works by Monet, Renoir, and Degas, this museum celebrates the beauty of the natural world.

name: Photography Museum
description: Capture the beauty of the world through the lens of photography at this captivating museum. Featuring works by Ansel Adams, Dorothea Lange, and Steve McCurry, this museum offers a visual journey through time and space.

name: Sculpture Garden
description: Explore the beauty of outdoor sculpture at this tranquil garden. Featuring works by Rodin, Moore, and Calder, this museum offers a serene escape into the world of sculpture.
